c74object.name: ears.fromvector~
c74object.digest: Convert synchronously a signal vector into a list
c74object.description: The ears.fromvector~ object inside a patch loaded by ears.process~ converts a signal vector into a list. It will then be possible to operate upon the list with regular Max object, and then convert it back to a signal vector through the ears.tovector~ object.

metadatalist.metadata: Andrea Agostini, partly based upon work by Alexander J. Harker
